name: Harold Tales - End B
description:
Phew. This is going to be my last performance huh?

Not gonna lie, this one’s gonna be incredibly painful. I’ve got the alter code set up. I’ve got the basics of how our dear old friend got into his position. I’m ready.

Just read the cue cards, calm down, and be poised. This hero iteration is a lot more serious than goofy, so I’d better act accordingly.

Singing the Theme6 song is tough, but I’m a diva. I sing my best performance out there and no one’s going to stop me.

It's probably going to be a bit loud though. Might have to run the speakers down a bit. And by that, set the volume down manually.

Ugh… the end result tho. I’m gonna be… 

(breathe in) (breathe out)

Alright. No use worrying about it now.

It's show time!

---------------

Controls

Z/Enter - Select

X/Esc - Cancel

Arrow Keys = Move
